name: r7rpg
command:
print(`{y}~r7rpg.register{/} Register/reset if it dead`)
print(`{y}~r7rpg.battle{/} Fight something`)
print(`{y}~r7rpg.dungeon{/} Visit a dungeon`)
print(`{y}~r7rpg.quest{/} List available quests`)
print(`{y}~r7rpg.revive{/} Revive/heal`)
print(`{y}~r7rpg.shop list{/} List items for sale`)
print(`{y}~r7rpg.buy *item name*{/} Buy an item`)
print(`{y}~r7rpg.use *item name*{/} Use an item`)
print(`{y}~r7rpg.useall *item name*{/} Use all of an item`)
print(`{y}~r7rpg.give(*player*) *item name*{/} Give item to player`)
print(`{y}~r7rpg.donate(*player*) *amount*{/} Donate money to player`)
print(`{y}~r7rpg.status{/} List player status/stats`)
print(`{y}~r7rpg.enemy{/} List enemy stats`)
print(`{y}~r7rpg.items list{/} List items`)
print(`{y}~r7rpg.items info{/} List item info`)
print(`{y}~r7rpg.info{/} Show player stats`)
print(`{y}~r7rpg.total{/} Show global stats`)
